name: Mueller Industries, Inc.
description: Mueller Industries, Inc. is a leading manufacturer and distributor of copper, brass, and plastic products for plumbing, HVAC, and refrigeration applications. Founded in 1917, the company has built a reputation for providing high-quality products and innovative solutions that serve a diverse range of industries. Mueller operates manufacturing facilities across the United States, Mexico, and the United Kingdom, ensuring a robust supply chain and extensive distribution network. With a commitment to excellence, the company focuses on continuous improvement and invests in advanced manufacturing technologies to enhance productivity and product quality. Mueller's extensive product line includes pipes, fittings, and valves, which are essential components for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. The company also emphasizes sustainability, actively pursuing environmentally friendly practices in its production processes. As a trusted partner in the plumbing and HVAC industries, Mueller Industries is well-positioned for growth and innovation, continually adapting to meet the evolving needs of its customers while maintaining high standards of quality and service.
